desc.zh-tw:
亞馬遜雲端運算(Amazon Web Service) 是一個高度可靠(Highly Reliable)，高擴充性(Highly Scalable)， 低成本(Low Cost)的基礎設施平台。 AWS在全球各地的客戶分布超過190個國家和地區，擁有數以千計的跨國公司，政府機構以及創業團隊。自從2006年推出以來，AWS利用建立在自己後端技術平台上的技術向廣大企業提供網絡服務。

技術創新一直是公司的核心文化，驅動著亞馬遜各部門的成長。經過十多年建設和運行運行巨大規模、高度可擴展的電子商務平台(Amazon.com) 的經驗，公司總結出了一套成功經營大規模技術基礎設施和數據中心的核心競爭力，併步入了一個更廣泛的新領域 -- 為開發人員和企業提供網路服務的平台。

如今，AWS平台包括30多個不同的服務，包括彈性計算(Elastic Compute Cloud)，存儲服務(Simple Storage Service)，數據庫服務(Relational Database Service)。 AWS的客戶可以選擇最適合其業務的發展平台或解決方案，進而把焦點放在企業創新，而不是花時間與金錢在維運硬體設備上。AWS的客戶包括高速成長的創業公司，例如Spotify，Dropbox和Pinterest，也包括成熟的大型公司，例如三星，殼牌，洲際酒店集團。當然也不乏台灣企業與新創團隊，例如TrendMico, D-Link, Pixnet, Cubie Messenger, iCook… 等。

AWS 目前在全球擁有多個數據中心（美國，巴西，歐洲，日本，新加坡和澳大利亞)，您可以選擇最適合貴公司業務市場的數據中心佈署服務。建議您可以透過 http://aws.amazon.com/free/ 註冊一個AWS帳號，並開始進行測試。

若您有任何AWS的相關問題，且希望跟AWS台灣團隊聯繫，請聯絡Locarno Pan locarnop@amazon.com 或是 James Tien jtien@amazon.com 。
desc.en: Amazon Web Services (AWS), an Amazon.com company, provides businesses around the world with a reliable, scalable, low-cost computing platform in the cloud. To date, hundreds of thousands of customers across 190 countries have been using the AWS Cloud to power their business--everything from high performance computing, SaaS and enterprise applications to social networking sites. AWS allows businesses to focus on tasks that truly differentiate their business, rather than worrying about infrastructure. There are no up-front costs and no long term commitment, you simply use the resources you need as your business demands them. Imagine the possibilities with your IT infrastructure in the cloud. Learn more at http://aws.amazon.com or Contact AWS TW Account Manager Locarno Pan locarnop@amazon.com or James Tien jtien@amazon.com

name.zh-tw: RS Components Ltd 英商歐諾時股份有限公司

desc.zh-tw:
RS Components 是優質服務領先全球的電子及維修產品分銷商，服務全球超過100萬名工程師。 RS 辦事處遍佈32個國家及擁有17個倉庫，提供超過 550,000款產品，包括電子、自動化與控制、測試及測量、電氣和機械元件， 且每天發出約 44,000 個包裹。

RS 於亞太地區足跡跨越10個市場，17個當地銷售辦事處及7個庫存量豐富的倉庫。倉庫分別位於奧克蘭、香港、上海、新加坡、悉尼及橫濱。作為亞太地區的最大經銷商，我們服務超過20萬工程師。

瀏覽RS的工程師線上支援平台designspark.com，即可下載DesignSpark PCB 第五版和ModelSource圖庫。該網站彙集了設計資訊、教學影片和科技部落格，並提供免費設計工具，為工程師提供貫穿設計流程的全方位支援，目前的註冊會員已逾13萬名。
desc.en:
RS Components is the world's leading high-service distributor of electronics and maintenance products serving over one million engineers worldwide. With operations in 32 countries and 17 warehouses, we offer more than 550,000 products ranging from electronics, automation and control, test and measurement, to electrical and mechanical components and ship around 44,000 parcels per day.

In Asia Pacific, RS Components' extensive and well established footprint spans 10 markets, 17 local sales offices and 7 fully-stocked warehouses in Auckland, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Singapore, Sydney and Yokohama. As the largest distributor in the region, we serve more than 200,000 engineers across Asia Pacific.

DesignSpark PCB Version 5 and ModelSource are available at designspark.com, RS’ online gateway created to support engineers throughout the design process by bringing together design information, user reviews and technical blogs, and free-of-charge tools, which today boasts more than 130,000 registered members.
desc.zh-cn:
RS Components 是全球领先的电子与维修产品高端服务分销商，服务全球超过100万工程师。 RS 办事处遍布32个国家并拥有17个仓，提供超过550,000款产品，包括电子、自动化及控制、测试与测量、电气和机械组件，且每天都会发出约 44,000 个包裹。

RS在亚太地区足迹跨越10个市场，17个当地销售办事处及7个库存量充裕的仓库。仓库分别位于奥克兰、香港、上海、新加坡、悉尼及横滨。作为亚太地区的最大经销商，我们服务超过20万工程师。

访问RS的工程师线上支持平台designspark.com，即可免费下载DesignSpark PCB 第五版和ModelSource图库。该网站汇集了设计资讯、教程视频和科技博文，并提供免费设计工具，为工程师提供贯穿设计流程的全方位支持，目前的注册会员已逾13万名。

desc.zh-tw:
也許你早已認識KKBOX， 也許你從沒聽過這個名字， 有人說我們是一家科技公司， 也有人說我們是數位音樂的代名詞， 這些解釋，以上皆是。 但我們喜歡這樣形容自己： “一個不受時空限制，讓人們輕鬆享受聽音樂並與同好分享樂趣的平台。”

我們覺得能和朋友、音樂人一起分享喜歡的音樂，豐富彼此的社群生活，是一件很酷的事， 因此我們每天都在思考著， 如何讓人們輕鬆自由地透過音樂，與自己的朋友和喜歡的音樂人更靠近。

KKBOX不是音樂家，也不是明星偶像， 把網路技術玩到極致才是我們的強項。 把音樂數位化不難， 但是把音樂變得像乾淨的自來水一樣， 讓人們無論在任何系統平台，用什麼上網工具，隨時、隨地都能聽到豐富而高品質的音樂， 這就有一點門檻了。

人們想要隨時隨地享受自己喜歡的音樂也不難， 但讓大家和好朋友、名歌手一起邊聽音樂邊聊天， 這門檻又更高了。 更不要說KKBOX擁有上千萬的音樂資料庫， 從華語、英語、日語到韓語， 從流行、古典、爵士、搖滾、嘻哈到電音， 從周杰倫到棉花糖，從Lady Gaga到火星人， 只要是好聽的音樂，KKBOX絕不讓它們缺席。

你問KKBOX還有哪些強項？ 動態歌詞方便你偷偷練唱，到KTV當歌王， 放心播方便店家商場公開播放，吸引顧客上門捧場， 音樂商店方便讓習慣擁有音樂的人下載單首收藏。

簡單說，把聽音樂變得好方便、好Easy是KKBOX的最強項！ 你還在等什麼？一起聽音樂吧！KKBOX
desc.en:
KKBOX is the leading provider of digital music subscription services in the Asia region, featuring over 10 million music tracks from over 500 major and local music labels and publishers. It also hosts the largest Chinese music library in the world. KKBOX offers unlimited and on-demand music; with a single monthly subscription fee, subscribers can stream music online and cache songs on their PCs and smartphones for offline access. The service is available in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore and Malaysia, where most of the region's pop-music stars and hit songs are produced and marketed.

The vision of KKBOX is to bring people together around their shared passion for music in a way that is affordable, accessible and enjoyable. It is committed to becoming the leading music platform for bringing people together and closer to their favorite artists and music. The service covers an online music library and a print music magazine, offering a rich collection of editorials, exclusive artist interviews, entertainment news and community features to attract and keep users attached to the service. With its music charts and annual Digital Music Awards, KKBOX has become the most influential benchmark for pop music in the Greater China region.

KKBOX initially launched in Taiwan in 2004, and the expansion to Hong Kong in 2009 has resulted in steadily increasing subscriptions. With this success, in December 2010, Japan’s telecoms giant, KDDI Group, acquired a majority share of KKBOX’s outstanding stocks; in March 2011 KKBOX accepted investment from HTC, the global leader in smartphone innovation and design. With its advanced product technology and strategic equity partnerships, KKBOX is aggressively expanding to Japan and other Asian markets.

desc.zh-tw: 「痞客邦 PIXNET」(www.pixnet.net) 為國內最受歡迎前5大部落格網站之一。提供網友線上相簿、網誌、影音服務等功能。營運目標是在既有基礎下提升現行個人相簿與網誌服務，提供網友享有更佳的 創作與社群交流平台。是目前國內Web 2.0應用服務的佼佼者，可提供網友更完整的服務。
desc.en: PIXNET Digital Media Corporation (PIXNET), headquartered in Taiwan, serves as a social network website, online photo gallery, and blog service provider. The company is developing a large user following in the Greater China region. The web information company, Alexa, reports that PIXNET currently ranks eighth for total visitor traffic within Taiwan and ranks 736 for total visitor traffic worldwide.

desc.zh-tw:
Yahoo!致力於讓全球網友的每日慣性造訪都充滿驚喜和愉悅。透過各種行動裝置，我們提供深入且完整的個人數位內容使用經驗，讓全球網友隨時與其最相關的人事物連結在一起。同時，Yahoo!有效連結廣告主與消費者關係，以創造絕佳廣告價值。Yahoo!總部位於美國加州森尼維耳市，並於美洲、亞太、歐洲、中東與非洲區都設有辦公據點。  

在台灣，Yahoo! 以Yahoo!奇摩為品牌，提供包括搜尋、新聞、知識+、電子信箱、購物中心、拍賣、股市、電影、運動等多項服務。除服務廣大網友及廣告主，Yahoo!奇摩也為企業提供電子商務解決方案。更多訊息歡迎瀏覽Yahoo!奇摩企業部落格(www.wretch.cc/blog/ycorpblog/)。
desc.en: Yahoo! is focused on making the world's daily habits inspiring and entertaining. By creating highly personalized experiences for our users, we keep people connected to what matters most to them, across devices and around the world.  In turn, we create value for advertisers by connecting them with the audiences that build their businesses.  Yahoo! is headquartered in Sunnyvale, Calif., and has offices located throughout the Americas, Asia Pacific (APAC) and the Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA) regions.   Yahoo!operates under the name Yahoo!Kimo in Taiwan and today owns a number of properties including Search, News, Knowledge +, Mail, Shopping, Auction, Finance, Movies and Sports. Yahoo!Kimo also provides a comprehensive suite of e-commerce services. For more information, visit the company’s corporate blog (www.wretch.cc/blog/ycorpblog).

desc.zh-tw: 威聯通科技股份有限公司 (QNAP Systems, Inc.)，如同其品牌所傳達「優質網路應用設備供應商」的承諾，以提供全面及先進的 NAS 網路儲存裝置及NVR安全監控系統解決方案為目標，讓使用者享有操作簡單、穩定性能及大儲存空間的數位應用產品。威聯通完美融合科技與設計理念，有效增進企業檔案管理、虛擬化應用、儲存空間管理，及安全監控的管理效率，同時也為家庭使用者提供多媒體影音體驗，豐富家庭娛樂生活。威聯通立足台北，用無盡的創新及熱情將優質產品帶給全世界。
desc.en: QNAP Systems, Inc., as its brand promise "Quality Network Appliance Provider", aims to deliver comprehensive offerings of cutting edge network attached storage (NAS) and network video recorder (NVR) solutions featured with ease-of-use, robust operation, large storage capacity, and trustworthy reliability. QNAP integrates technologies and designs to bring forth quality products that effectively improve business efficiency on file sharing, virtualization applications, storage management and surveillance in the business environments, as well as enrich entertainment life for home users with the offering of a fun multimedia center experience. Headquartered in Taipei, QNAP delivers its solutions to the global market with nonstop innovation and passion.

desc.zh-tw:
Vpon，數據驅動的情境式行動廣告。

成立於2008年，專注在行動裝置的行動廣告領域，憑藉強大的研發技術、海量數據處理分析，以及對品牌廣告主的商業拓展能力，「Vpon威朋」已服務超過500家知名品牌，包括：麥當勞、可口可樂、美國運通、花旗銀行等。獨立使用者超過2億，廣告業務涵蓋北京、上海、廣州、香港、台北等750多個城市，並獲得近千萬美金創投資金。目前Vpon於上海/北京/台北/香港設有辨公室，是亞洲地區成長最迅猛的行動廣告平台，獲選2012年《Forbes China富比士》中國行動網路公司30強殊榮。
Mozilla 是一個全球化的非營利組織，我們的願景是打造一個更開放自由的網路未來，提升人們的網路經驗，並支持開放源碼的資源共享精神。Mozilla 同時也是全球性的社群，由來自世界各地的軟體開發工程師、測試人員、廣告創意人員共同組成，一致的目標是支持網路資源的完全開放共享。Mozilla 相信只有開放的標準才能確保任何人、在任何地方都能感受到最安全、最流暢、多元化的網路經驗。
desc.en: Mozilla has been a pioneer and advocate for the Web for more than a decade. We create and promote open standards that enable innovation and advance the Web as a platform for all. Today, hundreds of millions of people worldwide use Mozilla Firefox to discover, experience and connect to the Web on computers, tablets and mobile phones. For more information please visit mozilla.org.

desc.zh-tw: 雪爾萊克使用近距離無線通信技術(Near Field Communication, NFC)，將報到資料與NFC貼紙連結，縮短大型活動冗長的進場等待時間。本次議程將帶領大家認識這個時下最夯的技術，並為大家帶來這個技術全新的視野。NFC不只是銀行、交通、電信業者的專利，利用身邊的NFC科技產品與opensource資源，我們都可以開發自己的NFC應用！
desc.en:
(Share Like) is Asia’s hottest social marketing startup company. Its clients vary from Disney (Oz), Sony Pictures (After Earth), Universal (Fast and Furious 6), Absinthe, FHM, and McDonalds as well as prominent nightclubs in Taipei (Marquee, Lava, Pasoul, and Stream) and Kaohsiung (Dream). It has also promoted for stars such as 謝金燕 and Akemi.

Share Like also supports local Taiwanese SME by increasing their brand value to helps them reduce promotional costs so they can pass their savings to their customers and focus on their services and products.

Share Like’s user friendly service also allows consumers to easily connect with the brands and its integrated applications and membership systems were developed to help provide unique insights for companies to better service its customers.

desc.zh-tw:
《Make》雜誌於2005年2月在美國創刊， 藉由介紹令人興奮的多樣化動手製作專題， 鼓勵讀者發揮創意充分活用各種科技。 讓讀者盡情發揮改造、破解與重組科技，是《Make》的最大宗旨。

馥林文化於2011年6月出版繁體國際中文版， 以季刊形式發刊，目前已發行至第八期。 今年5月，在台灣舉辦了第一場Maker Faire「Maker Faire: Taipei」， 未來將繼續發掘台灣的Maker和他們的精彩作品， 並透過《Make》國際中文版和Maker Faire活動， 將科技新訊和精采手作製品呈現給大眾。

晶璽商旅座落於信義計劃區內精華地段，飯店鄰近世貿展覽館，遠眺象山，101夜晚收您眼簾，只要3分鐘即可達世貿中心、101金融大樓、誠品及華納威秀商圈，交通便利，公車站步行約1分鐘；市政府捷運站，步行約10分鐘；生活機能極佳，讓您盡情探索台北。

88間精緻客房擁有現代的客房設備，和幾盡完美居住空間，從燈光的投影到床單的觸感，都意味著我們對您的重視，讓您商務之餘盡享休閒之樂，At Boutique Hotel是您商務洽公、參展時入住的絕佳之選。
desc.en: AT Boutique Hotel is strategically situated in the most fashionable and prestigious district of Taipei, offering our guests great convenience of location for business and entertainment. It’s just a three- minute walk to T.I.C.C&T.W.T.C and ten-minute walk to Taipei City Hall Metros station and a 45-minute car ride to T.T.I Airport. The hotel provides a 24-hour service for all your travel needs. Our hotel team will provide an unparalleled hospitality experience that will ensure an unforgettable stay at AT Boutique Hotel, Taipei.

desc.zh-tw: 祐生研究基金會自1978年12月30日設立登記以來，以對外一般碩士論文獎助，對內知識整理做為開端，經歷長年紮基的過程，在1987年起大力推動建築與環境永續發展相關的長期研究。在本會探究人類居住環境與永續發展的過程中發覺，近年來資訊科技與數位化的發展對於人類生活模式帶來了舉足輕重的影響，對於此領域之相關知識分享與整合，未來人才培育等等，是我們必需面對的重要課題之一。 因此，本會過去之碩士論文獎助主題除了與建築、環境、生態、健康相關議題以外，亦在2000至2008年間獎助「資訊社會與文化」類型之相關研究主題。而資訊科技與網路的發展為人類精神創發帶來新趨勢，所以在本會經過獎助方法與推廣模式的調整之後，目前首先針對國內獨立遊戲開發相關社群，推動小規模的知識與資訊分享聚會，將參訪國際遊戲開發論壇之研習心得與國內的獨立開發者交流，期能幫助國內相關社群之發展。 就其他面向的知識整合來說，過去本會曾發展出知識庫、索引書編寫、養成各科門知識執守者等知識整合應用方式，作為進行主題研究及各項開展會議時消除知識盲點、精進研討結論的利器。目前定期舉辦聯誼會及讀書會，強化祐生成員的知識密度，以面對異質多變的未來。
desc.en: Since its establishment on December 30, 1978, the Archilife Research Foundation has offered scholarships to support students in master courses to complete their theses, and implemented different ways to integrate knowledge. After long years of its pioneering stage, Archilife commenced various long-term researches in the areas of architecture, environmental sustainability and development starting from 1987. During the process of researching human inhabitations and sustainable development, Archilife discovered that advancements of information technologies and cyberspace over the past decade had profound impacts on human lifestyles. The sharing and integration of related knowledge, and the education in these fields should be one of Archilife's essential objectives. Therefore, besides scholarships regarding architecture, environmental sustainability, ecology and health care, Archilife offered scholarships for the theses related to information society and culture from 2000 to 2008 as well. On the other hand, information technologies and the Internet brought new possibilities to how people can express their creativities and interact with each other. So, subsequent to recent adjustments of the scholarships and the funding projects, Archilife started with holding a series of sharing and exchanging meet-ups among the domestic independent game developers' community, conveying and communicating the knowledge and experiences learned from certain international game development conferences, in the hope that it would help this community to evolve. About other aspects of knowledge integration, Archilife developed different methods including: a knowledge bank system, index books, and knowledge keepers in various fields. These resources have served as powerful tools in filling in research gaps and refining research findings. Archilife currently holds periodic communions and bookish assemblies to strengthen the knowledge of its members so as to face a heterogeneous and changing future.

desc.zh-tw: Faria Systems 是一家以 IB(International Baccalaureate) 國際學校為客戶的 Software as a Service 軟體公司，全球超過九十個不同國家、一千兩百所國際學校使用我們的產品。今年在台北設立公司總部，正在招募 Ruby on Rails 開發者。

全球風行的共用工作空間 (Coworking Space) 來了！CLBC 位於台北精華市中心，只要攜帶筆電來，就可以在這裡享受在巷弄辦公的人文氣息與咖啡香氣。

CLBC 致力於在推廣 Coworking 文化，並且為國際共用工作空間聯盟之成員，讓更多人能透過 Coworking 文化獲得更多創意靈感泉源。

我們預計將於 2013年7月起提供更完整的創業解決方案，除了共用工作空間服務之外，更追加提供了小型辦公室出租以及可容納 100 人以上的活動場地空間，讓台北的微型創業有更多更好的選擇。
desc.en: CLBC Coworking Space is located around MRT Da-An Station. You are also in easy walking distance to a few shopping areas/malls, and even more restaurants on the streets. Just bring your laptop here, then you are ready to go! We offer coffee, tea and soda in complimentary, you can just have a drink than sit and chat with people.
desc.zh-cn: 全球风行的共用工作空间 (Coworking Space) 来了！CLBC 位於台北精华市中心，只要携带笔电来，就可以在这里享受在巷弄办公的人文气息与咖啡香气。 CLBC 致力於在推广 Coworking 文化，并且为国际共用工作空间联盟之成员，让更多人能透过 Coworking 文化获得更多创意灵感泉源。 我们预计将於 2013年7月起提供更完整的创业解决方案，除了共用工作空间服务之外，更追加提供了小型办公室出租以及可容纳 100 人以上的活动场地空间，让台北的微型创业有更多更好的选择。

name.zh-tw: AcoMo 杏昕科技股份有限公司

desc.zh-tw:
杏昕科技股份有限公司主要業務為醫療器材設計服務，2013 年連續獲得德國 iF 設計獎以及德國紅點 (red dot)設計獎。

「輕鬆使用，完整照護」是 AcoMo Technology 研發團隊致力達到的設計目標。而開發一系列標誌著「台灣製造」的優質精品，更是研發團隊從「心」稟持的初衷。產品範圍將涵括嬰幼兒照護所需的各個面向，以高質量的電子設計研發實力為基礎，讓新生兒父母能輕鬆的使用 AcoMo Technology 所開發的種種人性化精品，在繁瑣的家務活動中，仍能周密地給予每一個寶貴的幼小生命 24 小時 365 天的零距離照護。
desc.en: AcoMo technology is the only one biotechnology company focusing on developing infants and kids electronic products in National Chiao Tung University Innovation Incubation Center.  “Easy to use and fully care” is the ultimate target that AcoMo Tech. research and development team aim to. Developing a series of “MIT (made in Taiwan)'s quality boutique” but also upholding the original intention of the research and development groups from the heart. AcoMo’s products range covers from required-oriented infant care, high-quality electronic design research and development capabilities. Parents can easily use AcoMo Tech’s user-friendly boutique which can give every precious young lives 24 hours 365 days up in close care carefully.

desc.zh-tw:
中華數位科技 Softnext Technologies Corp. 成立於2000年8月。 多年來秉持著【We Secure Your Content】的理念，致力於電子郵件安全、網路內容安全、企業資料保護的技術研究與開發，以提供完善的資訊內容安全解決方案及應用服務，協助企業以符合法規規範的方式進行資訊內容安全管理。研發產品榮獲多項創新研發大獎，廣受企業愛用與肯定。

為協助因應個人資料保護法，以異業結盟專業分工的模式，結合ISO管理顧問、專業法務律師與資安軟體顧問成立「企業資料保護研究小組」，提供個資法符合性顧問服務，協助企業檢視個資使用程序的法規符合性。
desc.en:
Softnext Technologies Corp. was established in August 2000. For years, we have been working hard by the motto 【We Secure Your Content】 and dedicated ourselves in the technical research and development of email security, Internet content security and corporate data protection. We provide a complete array of information content security solutions and application service to help companies with information content security management in a way that is complied with legal requirements. We have developed several products that won awards for innovative R&D and are highly recognized by many corporations.
To help with the conformity to the Personal Information Protection Act (PIPA), we have gathered a group of ISO management consultants, professional legal attorneys and information security program consultants and established a strategic alliance in the form of a “Corporate Information Protection Research Team” which provides PIPA conformity evaluation service and helps corporations examine their legal compliance with the personal information use procedure.

name.zh-tw: 數位人性科技股份有限公司(非常婚禮)

desc.zh-tw: 「非常婚禮 veryWed.com」是國內知名的婚禮服務入口網站 / 結婚社群網站。 創 業十餘年來，以開源技術幫助了無數海內外華人完成人生大事。 近年來積極參與 各大開源社群活動，希望大家不要再把我們當成婚友社了 :)
desc.en: veryWed.com is Taiwan's leading wedding/marriage community website. We have been helping people realize their dream wedding and adapt to married life with open source technology since 2000. And before you ask, no, we don't do dating services :)

desc.zh-tw: 巴哈姆特成立於 1996 年，當初是第一個以遊戲為主題的 BBS 站，於 2000 年設立公司隨即推出網站服務，如今已經邁入第 17 年。我們的使命是藉由社群力量，將動漫畫、遊戲市場帶到一個更蓬勃、更健全的發展環境。巴哈姆特有超然的立場，在所有廠商和玩家之中取得屹立不搖的地位，我們不變的經營理念是：以最專業、最負責、最客觀的立場，來提供所有玩家們最即時、最有品質、最多元化的服務。
desc.en: BAHAMUT was constructed at 1996, we eager to be the biggest gamer's community in Greater China region and we supply variety ACG contents included: On-line game、TV game(PS4、WiiU、XBOXone …)、Pocket game ( 3DS、PSV…) 、PC game、Mobile game also Animation and Comics. We have both high Reach Rate and Strong Stickiness and also willing to support game related exhibitions or conventions in the Greater China region. According to the research by "2013 Business Next Magazine", BAHAMUT is the TOP 7 website in Taiwan.
desc.zh-cn: 巴哈姆特成立于1996 年，当初是第一个以游戏为主题的 BBS ，于 2000 年设立公司随即推出互联网服务，如今已经迈入第17 年。我们的使命是藉由社群力量，将动漫画、游戏市场带到一个更蓬勃、更健全的发展环境。巴哈姆特有超然的立场，在所有厂商和玩家之中取得屹立不摇的地位，我们不变的经营理念是：以最专业、最负责、最客观的立场，来提供所有玩家们最即时、最有品质、最多元化的服务。

desc.zh-tw:
關於 Etu (知意圖)

Etu 以亞洲為舞台，是專為企業提供 Big Data End-to-End 解決方案的領導品牌。Etu 致力為產業客戶發展完整的軟、硬體，以及整合後的資料處理、分析，與未來擴充時所需的整體解決方案。協助客戶探勘企業內部的巨量多結構資料價值，使其能簡易地擷取潛藏在其中的商業價值。

Etu 團隊成軍於 2011 年，採台北-北京雙基地並行發展的營運模式，由一群累計擁有 30 年以上 Big Data 技術經驗的專業人士所組成，以共同的巨量資料分析夢想而相聚，並深知分散式運算架構、軟體為王，與自動化管理，才是雲端運算的真諦。早在 Apache Hadoop 誕生以前，Etu 核心成員就已經深入 Big Data 處理技術的發展，參與過世界級的大規模線上服務，與系統管理營運，在商業環境中運行過數百到上萬個節點的服務叢集，實現了先進技術的產業實踐驗證。Etu 數位成員擁有業界目前稀有的 Hadoop 專業認證：Cloudera Certified Developer / Administrator for Apache Hadoop。更多關於 Etu 訊息，請上 Etu 官網：www.etusolution.com
desc.en:
About Etu

Etu is a pioneer of Big Data providing Big Data solutions primarily focused on helping customers discover, unlock, and utilize valuable information embedded in extremely large data sets through simple steps. At Etu, our mission is to develop the value of Big Data Application Solutions with our Appliances and to concentrate on business developments in Taipei and Beijing. Our Big Data business is dedicated to providing End-to-End solutions for customers to effectively overcome the challenges of large data sets by utilizing Hadoop-related technologies, intimately working with all Hadoop distribution, and creating constant integration with third party tool vendors. With our core competency in Big Data, professionalism, and expertise Etu is able to address specific business problems for customers from a diverse set of industries. For more information about Etu, please visit www.etusolution.com.

desc.zh-tw: Moko365 創辦之初便以 Research Company 定位，從提供教育訓練開始，以一年的時間，成為台灣最知名的 Android 教育訓練品牌，同時也提供各式的技術服務。Moko365 目前是為台灣、大陸與美國企業指名的 Android 內訓服務公司。2012 年 10 月成立 Lightning Startup 團隊，專注於軟體創新研發與投資。 仕橙網站：www.moko365.com
desc.en: Moko365 is a leading company of Taiwan's Android training & engineering field. Founded in 2009 in Taipei, the company aims to provide training and software solutions. And already have served more than 50 enterprise customers. The company's training courses are in Taiwan, Beijing, Shanghai and Shenzen. And have already trained more than 5,000 engineers. Moko365 started their venture startup team at early 2013 to engage open innovation business. www.moko365.com

desc.zh-tw: 數位無限軟體成立於2003年，主要營運項目為雲端運算、多雲與混合雲管理平台以及巨量資料。我們立足於雲端運算市場作為事業發展的主軸，並且秉持著創新突破、追求卓越的精神來深耕台灣，持續發展自主性技術，提升國際競爭力。「扎根台灣，拓展全球」是我們的長期發展目標，我們不斷的開發自主性技術，透過執行多項解決方案來實踐，目前累積的客戶經驗已涵蓋多種產業：電信、教育、政府、科技、運輸、通路、電子商務…等，並且持續改善、追求卓越的技術品質，以客戶滿意程度為品質的指標，推動公司的持續成長。數位無限軟體自成立迄今已有十餘年，在這快速變動的科技產業，我們不斷研發各項雲端創新技術，以期更加符合各項市場需求。
desc.en: Infinities software was established in 2003. We focus on providing cloud Computing, Multi Cloud and Hybrid Cloud Management Platform, Big Data. Our long-term target is to sharing our technology to the worldwide. Innovation is our key value. The specific practice is to developing "Skyport" technology to integrating every hypervisor. We have plenty of experiences for many solutions. The coverage of served customers are in many industries, such as Telcom, Manufacture, Information service, Government, Logistics. We are continuously innovate core technology to fulfill the deamand of market.

name.zh-tw: 慧邦科技股份有限公司(神來也)

desc.zh-tw:
慧邦科技自2008年起陸續開發了【神來也麻將、大老二、接龍、13支、德州撲克】、【大武鬥】等免下載flash多人遊戲; 首創用facebook、yahoo等帳號直接登入遊戲的作法，在短短2年吸引全球上千萬名使用者，成功襲捲web game市場，並於2011年推出iPhone, iPad, Android版的神來也系列遊戲，一年內累積app下載量超過800萬次。在2013年，慧邦科技再度顛覆玩家對網頁遊戲的想像，推出台灣自製第一款3D網頁射擊遊戲「即刻槍戰Guns Rush」！玩家只要安裝Unity3D Player、毋需下載主程式，點開網頁即可享受華麗科幻、絕無冷場的多人射擊快感。

從「神來也」到「即刻槍戰」，慧邦科技一路抱持著對休閒對戰遊戲的熱情、不斷精進，提供玩家好玩、大眾化、隨手可得、永遠都有新鮮感的遊戲體驗，並在2013年全新推出Gamesofa遊戲平台(http://www.gamesofa.com)，未來將以更多樣的5分鐘對戰遊戲、讓全球玩家隨時隨處享受歡樂的休閒時光!
desc.en:
Starting from 2008, Gamesofa launched a series of Flash-based, multiplayer online games including GodGame Mahjong, Big Two, Sevens, and Texas Hold’em Poker. In the span of two short years, the company quickly attracted over 10 million users worldwide by enabling direct login from sites such as Facebook and Yahoo!, emerging as a success in the web game market. In 2011, Gamesofa released iPhone, iPad, and Android versions of the games in the GodGame series, accumulating over 8 million downloads within a year. In 2013, Gamesofa introduced Guns Rush, becoming the first Taiwanese company to create a 3D shooting game on the web. Users need only to install Unity3D Player and open a web browser to enjoy an exciting, graphics-rich battle with other players.

From GodGame to Guns Rush, Gamesofa is dedicated to creating casual, PvP games that provide users with a fun and approachable gaming experience that never gets old. With the creation of a new gaming platform, Gamesofa (http://www.gamesofa.com) in 2013, we hope to continue creating a greater variety of games and allow more people worldwide to experience fun in five easy minutes!

name.zh-tw: 瞻營全電子股份有限公司

desc.zh-tw:
瞻營全電子(DMP)成立於1989年，始終專注於嵌入式電腦系統的研發生產，研發領域涵蓋x86 SoC、嵌入式系統、多媒體應用及智能機器人。DMP產品現今廣泛使用於全球工業電腦製造商、智能電網、綠色節能電腦、工業自動化、監控設備、廣告機及軍 工規的嚴苛環境。

由於相信機器人是未來產業發展的一個新趨勢，DMP多年前便規畫並投入大量人物力於機器人關鍵模組及技 術研發上，同時也積極參與了國內學研單位(如工研院、精密機械研發中心)的合作開發計劃。為支持國內機器人領域的開源發展，DMP目前有多項 機器人相關的開放源碼計劃正在進行。
desc.en:
Established in Taiwan since 1989, DMP Electronics Inc has focused on kernel technology of x86 embedded in hardware development and manufacture. Except the standard x86 embedded Single-Board-Computer products, DMP expands services covering the design and manufacture of OEM /ODM for many years, such as Power Application, ATM, Medical, Equipment, Home Entertainment, Automation, Metering Control Module, Gate System, etc. DMP also provides clients with the complete technical support relating Linux and Windows Embedded OS. In response to client’s multiple demands, DMP has released serial application products, such as Touch Panel PC, Notebook (Edubook), Keyboard PC and Auto Vehicle Locator (AVL). All of them are based on x86 SoC embedded technologies.

Believing that robotics is an important topic in the future industry, DMP is being involved in the development of advanced robot technology. Especially, several open-source projects related to robotics are working in progress, including an 80-cm humanoid robot, LinuxCNC, 86Duino and the RoBoard robot controller.

desc.zh-tw:
『遊戲基地』為台灣最大的出版集團「城邦文化事業股份有限公司」旗下所經營的遊戲入口社群網站。自2000年成立至今，一直秉持著媒體公正獨立的精神，為廣大的讀者提供迅速正確的電腦遊戲資訊，不具廠商色彩，報導獨立性高，因此廣受會員信賴。

『遊戲基地』也針對玩家們量身定做了各式的服務，讓使用者有一個自在的互動空間。「遊戲基地」的目標，就是成為匯集所有遊戲資訊的中文世界第一個遊戲入口網站，以服務廣大的玩家。
desc.en: Founded in 2000, Gamebase is one of the branches of the Cite Media Holding Group which is the largest publisher in Taiwan. As a game portal site, Gamebase is highly trusted by gamers not only for providing the latest computer games information but for the independent and fair reportage. Gamebase also provide all kinds of custom services for gamers, letting them interact each other freely. The goal of Gamebase is to become the best game portal site gathering all the game information for the Chinese gamers.

name.zh-tw: 英屬維京群島商時間軸科技股份有限公司台灣分公司

desc.zh-tw: 2008年成立，為台灣第一家同時提供社群、網際網路、手機網路三網一實解決方案團隊，創辦時以網站聯播工具『好時光貼曆』進入市場，創造百萬會員，單日破千萬PV，並同時追蹤800萬筆中文RSS內容等佳績，並曾獲得 Idea Show 首獎肯定！時間軸創辦成員擁有網路平台與行動建置營運經驗，六年來從技術型團隊轉型為全方位數位解決方案提供者，獲得許多重要獎項肯定，協助品牌客戶提供多元化行動平台策略，為台灣最大行動行銷專業團隊，服務眾多品牌客戶。同時營運行動商務平台 APP『巷弄』及『配配』！目前也為全球最大手機成效廣告Tapjoy 台灣總代理，是台灣行動媒體及行動商務發展的重要智庫。
desc.en:
Established in 2008, Hiiir is the first company in Taiwan to provide marketing service that integrates social media, the web, and mobile applications.

We created own production, Timely , a famous marking tool in Taiwan, has earned 3.8 million members, and created 15 million Page View per day. Our team members' breadth of experience in the construction and operation of online platforms and mobile media has enabled us to provide clients customized and targeted marketing solution. Hiiir is currently the largest online marketing team in Taiwan, with clients from around the world, including the "Coca-Cola 125th Anniversary App, " "Sushi Express Game App," and "FamilyMart App." We provide brands the most trend-setting marketing solutions. In fact, the apps and services we developed currently hold 80% of the market.another product, Alley ,a mobile app on iOS and Android that provide restaurant coupon. we won lot of experience from building ,serving and marketing. According these experience ,we provided to client valuable service. Hiiir is also the exclusive distributor of Tapjoy, the world's largest mobile advertising giant. Having received multiple awards in the website and app marketing categories from the Click Awards, Hiiir is Taiwan's frontier in mobile solutions and business development.

desc.zh-tw:
Nulab Inc是一個成立於2004年的日本敏捷式軟體開發公司，致力於開發改善工作協作的網路服務，同時添加更多趣味和創意元素在服務中，讓工作變得更有趣。目 前Nulab提供兩款網路服務: Cacoo和貝格樂Backlog。

Cacoo為即時協作繪圖工具，可以讓用戶與其他工 作伙伴即時在線上一起製作多種圖表，如：Sitemaps, wireframes, UML, 心智圖等。Cacoo使用者遍佈全球 100多個國家。支援包括繁體中文共 21種語系，深受開發人員和設計人員喜愛。

貝格樂則是專為團隊工作成員們所設計的專案管理工具 。使用者介面簡單好用，能立即上手。貝格樂支援繁體中文並提供：甘特圖、燃盡圖、版本管理、專案進度視覺化、檔案共享等功能，可幫助工作團隊達到真正的團 體協作，將專案導向成功。

Nulab深信客戶的滿意度是我們研發的動力，我們會持續聆聽客戶的聲音，研發出更多新功能及新服務。瞭解更多相關資訊請至： http://nulab-inc.com
desc.en:
Nulab is an agile software development company established in 2004.Since then, we have been in pursuit of improving work collaboration, as well as incorporating elements of fun and creativity in our products. We now provide 2 products: Cacoo and Backlog.

Cacoo is a web-based, real-time, collaborative drawing tool that enables users to create a great variety of diagrams including wireframes, sitemaps and mindmaps. The collaborative function of Cacoo allows multiple people from a team to work on the same diagram simultaneously.

Backlog launched in 2006 as a project management tool with a focus on team communication. Consisting features such as task management, file sharing, as well as version control.Backlog provides a simple and comprehensive user interface for its users.

Nulab believes customers' satisfaction is our motivation. We will continue to listen to our customers and develop more new features and services. For more information, please visit http://nulab-inc.com

desc.zh-tw: 悠夏爾科技團隊成員為業界「網站設計開發」、「Agile - Scrum 軟體專案管理」、「Linux 伺服器系統及雲端平台」等領域之專家，幫助客戶在服務開發階段或服務上線前後，做全面的評估、分析及其他實際協助。

name.zh-tw: cacaFly 聖洋科技股份有限公司

desc.zh-tw:
cacaFly 聖洋科技正式成立於2009年，是 funP.com 的子公司。

funP.com 是由一群交大的年輕朋友一同創立的 Web 2.0 網站，並獲得詹宏志先生等業界前輩的投資與指導，cacaFly 則是因應 Facebook 時代業界對社群行銷的需求，由 funP 建構出的全新服務團隊。

2011年與Facebook正式簽約，成為Facebook 廣告在台業務總代理。 2013年與Microsoft正式簽約，成為Microsoft Advertising 在台業務總代理。 cacaFly 提供客戶最優質的數位媒體廣告服務，為客戶業績與行銷加分。
desc.en: cacaFly is the branch company established under the original headquarter company – funP.com and is now the leading company in the social networking field. funP.com was a web. 2.0 website created by a group of young graduates from National Chiao Tung University and invested by several senior leaders in the online marketing filed such as Mr. Hung-Tze Jan - founder of PCHome Online. Based on the Facebook generation and its marketing demand for social marketing, cacaFly was therefore established as a new business unit to serve the market needs. In 2011, cacaFly became the official Facebook authorized advertising reseller in Taiwan until now.With solid partnerships and a plenty of customers（ large and small）, cacaFly has grown splendidly and consistently. In 2013, cacaFly become the official Microsoft Advertising authorized reseller inTaiwan.

desc.zh-tw: 廣達研究院 (Quanta Research Institute)是廣達內部未來前瞻科技與產品的研發單位，更是引領雲端創新研發的火車頭。研究院透過整合國內外研發資源，以創新技術的研發與技術人 才的培育，強化廣達的核心技能、創造利基產品。   廣達研究院以「人本自動化創新」為宗旨，透過貼近使用者 (end user)需求的研究、創造新的使用者經驗，統合廣達各事業群在伺服器端、無線網路端、和使用者終端的各類產品線及領先技術，讓使用者(Anyone)可 以在任何時候(Anytime)、(Anywhere)任何地方，享受無間斷的雲端技術服務。   未來廣達研究院將繼續積極開發全新雲端系統與服務，並結合創新商業模式，創造市場新價值。
desc.en: Quanta Research Institute is Quanta’s research and development center for future technology and products; it is also the pioneering force in Cloud innovation.Through collaboration with domestic and oversea R&D resources, QRI develops the latest technology with talented staff, to strengthen Quanta’s core technology and create niche products. Taking “Human Centric Innovation” as our motto, through research that is closely related to the needs of end users, creating new user experience, as well as integrating Quanta’s product know-how and technology in servers, wireless connectivity and client devices, anyone can enjoy seamless Cloud service, anytime and anywhere. In the future, QRI will continue to devote in the development of advanced Cloud system and service, to create new value with the most innovative business model.

desc.zh-tw:
《數位時代媒體群》創立於1999年7月， 跨越20世紀，走過科技發展的關鍵年代，見證網路新經濟風起雲湧的演進歷程， 我們持續探索、記錄、解讀全球正在發生，和即將發生的數位革命與變動。

《數位時代媒體群》為讀者尋找影響下一步的「新觀念」，描繪正在形成的「新環境」，記錄開創未來的「新典範」，深掘新商業模式的「新機會」及「新價值」，為讀者早一步解讀趨勢脈動，領先掌握下一步行動的競爭優勢。

凝聚全台最具影響力的科技菁英社群， 集結台灣最具創造力的開發者及創業菁英， 成為全台灣最重要的科技財經社群及知識傳播平台。

OpenFoundry 及 OSSF 的誕生 順應國內外自由軟體應用日益普及的潮流，中央研究院資訊科學研究所於民國92年接受經濟部工業局「自由軟體產業推動計畫」的補助，成立自由軟體鑄造場 (Open Source Software Foundry，以下簡稱 OSSF )，以擴大自由軟體在臺灣的應用幅度與研發能量。目前經費的來源，部分來自行政院國家科學委員會的補助，部分則來自於中央研究院資訊科技創新研究中心。 OSSF 重點任務為培植本土自由軟體社群與人才，提供了五大服務：

  1. 匯集自由軟體領域的專業資源目錄

  2. 發行自由軟體鑄造場電子報

  3. 舉辦各類自由軟體活動及工作坊

  4. 從事校園推廣及提供自由軟體相關教材影片

  5. 提供法律政策諮詢與服務
desc.en: The Open Source Software Foundry (OSSF) project was launched by the Institute of Information Science at Academia Sinica in 2003. Initially, it was sponsored by the Industrial Development Bureau of the Ministry of Economic Affairs as a part of the “Open Source Software Initiative” to promote the use and development of open source software in Taiwan. Since 2007, the project has been funded by the National Science Council as well as the Research Center for Information Technology Innovation (CITI) at Academia Sinica. To promote the development and use of open source software, OSSF provides a forum that facilitates interaction and collaboration between open source software developers, and serves as a bridge to link developers with industry and academia. The followings are the five major services we provide: 1. Resource Catalog 2. OSSF Newsletters 3. Open Source Workshops 4. Promoting Open Source Software in Universities and Schools 5. Legal and Licensing Consultations

name.zh-tw: 國立中央大學資訊工程學系

desc.zh-tw:
本系於1981年設立碩士班、1992年成立大學部，並以培育具有開創性的優秀資訊人才、訓練具有專業性的技術人才以及研發具有前瞻性的資訊科技為設立宗旨；目前有教授17名、副教授6名及助理教授5名，共28位專任教師，所有教師獲有國內外之博士學位，並依據教師專長領域規劃各具特色的六大研究學群：軟體工程研究學群、資料工程研究學群、網路工程研究學群、多媒體工程研究學群、系統工程研究學群與計算理論與應用研究學群。

本系必修課程著重於深植專業領域之基礎教育以奠定學生實力，選修課程則大部份銜接研究所之課程，加強軟、硬體方面的專業訓練，以及因應迅速的國際資訊發展，不斷推陳出新開授各類選修課程。而學生程式設計能力的養成與訓練，尤為本系教學重點方向之一，並以各種方式鼓勵及獎勵學生參與國內外競賽，對學生未來深造或進入職場有絕大助益。
desc.en:
Founded in 1981, our department gets nearly 110 undergraduates and 125 graduate students enrolling each year and that number continues to grow. We offer cross-disciplinary research opportunities that encourage innovation and collaboration and also help our students become well-prepared engineers or innovative researchers.

We carefully categorize our faculty members and their courses into six research groups creating computer experts with excellent research skills. These groups work together and yet are top-notch research entities on their own, as well. The six groups are:

Software Engineering Research Group

Information Engineering Research Group

Network Engineering Research Group

Multimedia Engineering Research Group

System Engineering Research Group

Theory of Computation and its Applications Research Group

desc.zh-tw:
中國文化大學經過數十載耕耘，現有12個學院，是一所科系多元、完備的綜合性學術殿堂。

近來透過數位網路學習已經成為日常生活的一環，然而人與人的互動交流學習機會並不會因雲端化而停止。藉由與大型資訊開源社群活動合作乃學術單位在現今資本社會下，維繫多元化價值與知識的平衡點。

期許「承東西之道統，集中外之精華」，達到東方與西方、人文與科學、藝術與思想、理論與實用的全面結合。中國文化大學能夠在如此重要的開源學術與專業活動中奉獻支持，將樹立高等學術機構追求卓越之先驅風範。

桑格設計書店 (Sungoodbooks) 創立於 1983 年，專營進口世界各國廣告、平面、包裝、產品、建築、室內、攝影、動畫、網頁、互動介面、插畫、服裝、手工藝、藝術等各類最新精選設計書籍，及設計師們必備的 PANTONE 色票。

桑格成立已將近三十年，伴隨著歲月的增長，好友們與我們共同成長。終於，在 2004 年起開始建構網路書城，數千種設計書籍逐步上線，每本書均內含詳細的書本介紹以及 12 頁精美內頁，給予讀者更安心又保障的貼心服務。 誠摯邀請您共同參與絢麗的設計旅程~

Registrano 是你的活動線上報名系統

研討會、講座、營隊、團購、大食團、徵人、連署、出遊、進香團或各種社群活動......你每次要舉辦活動的時候，都在煩惱怎麼製作活動網站、處理報名事宜嗎？在 Registrano 建立活動是如此簡單，一切都可以在彈指之間輕鬆完成。
desc.en: Registrano – Your online event registration platform. Whenever you want to hold an event, and whatever you want it to be, Registrano can get things done within a few clicks. Registrano can get you event page set and grant your participants simple access to registration in no time.

desc.zh-tw:
我是人還是攝影師？

我們懂的是情感，還是元素的對比？

視框，地平線，構圖，能不能比得上以乾淨的畫面蓋出的一座光影流麗的情感之城

我總是告訴自己，不能的，不能得

因為，拍攝到的世界由心決定

　　

於是當我決定拿起相機的刹那

回憶是時間的切片，一幕一幕都要那麼乾淨，清楚

純粹是前進的動力，讓每一張所謂的照片

都要有記憶的味道

　　

你/妳看見了我的快門成就的是你回憶的軌跡

要的是那麽塵封往事的一張相紙

還是

永遠永願分秒悸動的瞬間

富銘科技為Blackmagic Design在台唯一官方授權之合法總代理，擁有強大的技術支援與維修團隊並秉持著誠信、專業的精神，提供消費者完善的產品解決方案與可靠的售後服務品質！

歡迎購買Blackmagic Design商品時，指名台灣總代理富銘科技公司貨，為您購買的設備器材提供最完整的商品保障。

Inside 是台灣科技媒體領導品牌，成立於 2009 年 11 月底，係由一群熱愛網路的人所成立的共筆部落格。

我們專注於觀察創新、科技、新媒體與網路的趨勢發展，報導新創公司、創業家、網站、行動平台、社群媒體、行銷與數位內容。

癮科技(COOL3C.COM)為台灣知名科技媒體網站，根據全球數據監測公司 comScore 測量，癮科技有每月近百萬名不重複使⽤用者(UV)。癮科技除了每天有12篇左右的國內外 最新3C產品、APP軟體消息,也與 網友分享許多科技⽣生活新知,另外更 透過許多深度分析、實測觀點的專欄，讓科技更貼近網友們的生活。

現在癮科技現在還致力於回答生活中「為什麼」的問題，例如「Youtube影片為什麼觀看次數都會留在301次好一陣子」這樣的小問題，解開了就會有一種爬上山頂喝上兩口涼水的唱快感呢！

科技報橘 TechOrange 是一家創立於台灣的新媒體，於 2010 年底成立，旨在探討全球重要網路、科技與創業趨勢，並關注網路軟體科技對全球政治、經濟與發展的變遷影響。科技報橘 TechOrange 目前列名台灣前三大網路科技媒體。

除了最新趨勢消息與重要評論，科技報橘 TechOrange 每雙月舉辦 TO Startup Mixer，透過虛實整合的內容呈現方式，提供來自全球的最新趨勢議題討論，集結華文區線上、線下網路科技知識社群。

科技報橘 TechOrange 母公司流線傳媒Fusionmedium，以科技報橘TechOrange 為新媒體實驗室，研發泛媒體與內容行銷產業應用之各類型軟體服務工具，提供多元化的網路媒體經營與行銷之完整解決方案。
成立於1999年11月的Linux Pilot Ltd.，是一間以Linux及開放源碼軟體知識為本的公司，其產品及服務包括網站新聞資訊、刊物出版及培訓課程，務求以全方位方式滿足各界的學習需求。 而自2001年出版的Linuxpilot月刊，更是現時亞洲市場唯一的中文Linux期刊，至今已出版超過120期，廣為亞洲中文Linux用戶所愛戴。
